text: Dilliram Sanyasi (born 14 November 1995) is an Indian professional footballer from Sikkim, who plays as a winger for East Bengal F.C. (R) in the I-League 2nd Division. ==Career== Dilliram Sanyasi began his career from the youth setup of Minerva Punjab. He made his professional debut in the 2015–16 I-League 2nd Division against Mohammedan Sporting. In April 2020, he signed on a 3 years contract with the East Bengal F.C.
